articles.description: Follow 5 Live commentary, score & text updates as England play Australia in a friendly at Wembley.
articles.title: England host Australia in Wembley friendly - radio & text

articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifier: Republic of Ireland v Greece

articles.description: England and Essex legend Alastair Cook announces his retirement from professional cricket, ending a record-breaking 20-year career.
articles.title: England and Essex legend Cook retires from cricket

articles.description: Kane Williamson retires hurt after scoring 78 on his return as New Zealand beat Bangladesh by eight wickets in Chennai.
articles.title: Williamson stars on return as NZ beat Bangladesh

articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentary as Bristol Bears host Leicester Tigers at Ashton Gate in the opening game of the 2023-24 Gallagher Premiership season.
articles.title: Listen: Premiership - Bristol Bears v Leicester Tigers

articles.description: Owen Farrell will replace George Ford at fly-half for England's Rugby World Cup quarter-final against Fiji, with Marcus Smith starting at full-back.
articles.title: Farrell replaces Ford for England's quarter-final

articles.description: The Scottish FA is writing to Uefa seeking clarification on Scotland's disallowed goal in Thursday's 2-0 loss to Spain.
articles.title: Scottish FA writes to Uefa over VAR in Spain loss

articles.description: Watch highlights as New Zealand continue their perfect start to their ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 campaign with an eight-wicket victory over Bangladesh in Chennai.
articles.title: NZ beat Bangladesh to maintain perfect start

articles.description: Aston Martin driver Lance Stroll apologises to Formula 1's governing body for his actions after qualifying at last weekend's Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: Stroll apologises to FIA for behaviour at Qatar GP

articles.description: New Zealand captain Kane Williamson retires hurt on 78 in his first appearance in seven months against Bangladesh in Chennai.
articles.title: Williamson suffers freak hand injury on NZ return
